page.title: 11HOME LIFE W'BOURNE VALLEY
page.content: {FAMILY LIFE} This is a sparsely pop- ulated area with approximately 9 young families with an average of two child- ren per family; the remainder are of an older generation. One family's parents are separated. No-one is unemployed. {DOMESTIC ACTIVITIES Families live in modern type houses or modernised cottages. Cooking is done by electricity, solid or oil-fired stoves or calor gas; houses are heated by the same means. High percentage have fire places and can have open fires. Families either have their main meal at mid-day or in the evening depending whether the husband is working locally or if there are school children who take packed lunches. {DOMESTIC PETS} cats, dogs, guinea pigs {HOUSEHOLD SAFETY} Modernised cottages usually have had complete electric re- wiring.No unsafe accommodation exists.
